metadata.Title: CVE-2023-25585 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was found in Binutils. The use of an uninitialized field in the struct module *module may lead to application crash and local denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-25585` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

binutils - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
binutils-multiarch - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
binutils-source - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
binutils-static - 2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

notes.Note: seth-arnold> binutils isn't safe for untrusted inputs.

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.24-5ubuntu14.2+esm1').
